name: Garden Stellar Musical Pillar
description: A metal pillar with an elaborate structure, the crown of which is adorned with stars and rings. It is of the same design as the metal pillar in the Astral Garden.\nIt is said that the interior of these pillars is filled with complex and intricate mechanisms, and when they were still functional, the pillars could not only rotate but also simultaneously produce pleasant sounds of various pitches, hence their nickname of "musical pillars." But it seems none know the exact purpose of such a unique design...
